Enum JobStatus

  • Defined in File job_checker.h

Enum Documentation

enum class JobStatus

Enumeration of possible Gaussian job completion states.

This enumeration defines all possible states that a Gaussian calculation job can be in, based on analysis of the log file content. The status determination is based on specific patterns found in Gaussian output.

Values:

enumerator COMPLETED

Job completed successfully with “Normal termination”.

enumerator ERROR

Job terminated with error (various error patterns)

enumerator PCM_FAILED

Specific failure due to PCM convergence issues.

enumerator RUNNING

Job is still in progress (no termination found)

enumerator UNKNOWN

Status cannot be determined from available information.
